au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: g5_1.3m_BS4_offset_100910
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(500,300) # Drive guide to g5 driveGuide(guideConfig.g5) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g5) driveEntRotAp(180) # Select beam stop selBs(4)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(40, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(40, 0) driveBsz(263)
